docs.abstract: A new study examines YouTube’s efforts to limit the spread of conspiracy theories on its site,  from videos claiming the end times are near to those questioning climate change.
docs.snippet: A new study examines YouTube’s efforts to limit the spread of conspiracy theories on its site,  from videos claiming the end times are near to those questioning climate change.
docs.lead_paragraph: A new study examines YouTube’s efforts to limit the spread of conspiracy theories on its site,  from videos claiming the end times are near to those questioning climate change.

headline.main: Can YouTube Quiet Its Conspiracy Theorists?
headline.print_headline: Can YouTube  Hold the Line On Its Fringe?
